metadata.name: !!Better Minimap ~White~
metadata.description: [h1]Mod description[/h1] An alternate take on [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2534310479]Better Minimap[/url]. Like the other mod, this mod trims out a lot of the thick borders from the minimap and includes support for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1978904635]MiniMAPI[/url], but this version comes in a high contrast white theme.
